step_feedback.feedback: You're doing a great job keeping your arm straight overhead. Focus on feeling that gentle resistance as you stretch.
Excellent! You're opening your palm and fingers wide. Keep this up to maximize the pumping action.
Good work making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. This is key for effective pumping.
Nicely done opening your hand and relaxing as you exhale. Visualize the fluid moving out with each breath.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with the overhead arm stretches and hand movements. Remember to breathe deeply and visualize the fluid moving out with each pump. Keep up the good work!
